text: "The Many Ways" is a song by American singer Usher. It was released as the last single from his debut album Usher (1994). The song did not do so well on the music charts. It reached at number 42 on the Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks chart. It did not chart on the Hot 100. ==Track listing== ;US Single *1. Many Ways [Album Version] *2. Many Ways [Radio Version] *3. Many Ways [Album Instrumental] ==Charts== Chart (1995) Peak position US Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks 42 Category:1995 songs Category:Usher songs
title: The Many Ways
